item.description:
June 25,2011 - Concert-N-Comedy- Acoustic Folk Comedy of Christine Lavin & Don White. Check it out at amazingthings.org. 

 

We have 8 people going to this event. It is now closed.

 

6/25/11 at 5:30 pm- Restorantte Cantina Italiana Restorante - We have reservations for 8.

                              911 Waverly St.

                              Framingham,MA 01702

                              (508) 879-7874

Please let me know ahead of time if your NOT joining us for dinner.

 

8pm - Amazing Things Arts Center -(508) 405-2787 - amazingthings.org

We have 8 tickets in row 5 near the concessions. You will need to tell the usher the row & that your Kiki. We have the whole row. I don't believe there are actual tickets.

 

Email me if you have questions. Kiki  ;-)
item.name: Concert-N-Comedy
